Identification.LongTitle: Regulations Respecting the Application of Section 9 of Part XVIII of Schedule III to the Excise Tax Act to Energy Conservation Equipment

Section.Text: These Regulations may be cited as the Energy Conservation Equipment Exemption Regulations.
The following equipment, articles and materials are hereby prescribed, for the purposes of section 9 of Part XVIII of Schedule III to the Excise Tax Act, to be energy conservation equipment:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: thermal insulation designed for pipes, ducts, boilers, tanks and wrapping materials designed exclusively for use with such insulation;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: wood-burning stoves, wood-burning stove kits, wood-burning furnaces and wood-burning space heaters other than

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: stoves, furnaces or space heaters that burn any oil or gas;

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: wind deflectors designed to reduce fuel consumption and for installation on motor vehicles and trailers;

Paragraph.Label: (e)
Paragraph.Text: waterwheels for converting water power to mechanical or electrical energy and pumps and generators specifically designed for use with such waterwheels;

Paragraph.Label: (f)
Paragraph.Text: loading dock door seals and shelters designed to conserve heated or refrigerated air during loading and unloading; and
